entries.name: allocation_class_path(object) → stringclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns the class for the given object.

entries.name: allocation_generation(object) → integer or nilclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns garbage collector generation for the given object.

entries.name: allocation_method_id(object) → stringclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns the method identifier for the given object.

entries.name: allocation_sourcefile(object) → stringclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns the source file origin from the given object.

entries.name: allocation_sourceline(object) → integerclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns the original line from source for from the given object.

entries.name: count_imemo_objects([result_hash]) → hashclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Counts objects for each T_IMEMO type.

entries.name: count_nodes([result_hash]) → hashclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Counts nodes for each node type.

entries.name: count_objects_size([result_hash]) → hashclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Counts objects size (in bytes) for each type.

entries.name: count_symbols([result_hash]) → hashclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Counts symbols for each Symbol type.

entries.name: count_tdata_objects([result_hash]) → hashclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Counts objects for each T_DATA type.

entries.name: internal_class_of(obj) → Class or Moduleclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Return internal class of obj.

entries.name: internal_super_of(cls) → Class or Moduleclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Return internal super class of cls (Class or Module).

entries.name: memsize_of(obj) → Integerclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Return consuming memory size of obj.

entries.name: memsize_of_all([klass]) → Integerclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Return consuming memory size of all living objects.

entries.name: reachable_objects_from(obj) → array or nilclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Return all reachable objects from `obj'.

entries.name: reachable_objects_from_root → hashclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Return all reachable objects from root.

entries.name: trace_object_allocations { block }click to toggle source
entries.desc: Starts tracing object allocations from the ObjectSpace extension module.

entries.name: trace_object_allocations_clearclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Clear recorded tracing information.

entries.name: trace_object_allocations_startclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Starts tracing object allocations.

entries.name: trace_object_allocations_stopclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Stop tracing object allocations.
